teacheasy.mediahandler

Class MultipleChoiceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.mediahandler.MultipleChoiceHandler

  • public class MultipleChoiceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to handle the multiple choice objects on a page.
    Version:
    1.0 07 Mar 2015
    Author:
    Emmanuel Olutayo

    • Method Detail

      • createMultipleChoice

        public void createMultipleChoice(float xStart,
                        float yStart,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Answer> answers,
                        MultipleChoiceObject.MultiChoiceType type,
                        MultipleChoiceObject.Orientation orientation,
                        boolean retry,
                        int marks)
        Method to add a multiple choice object to a page
        Parameters:
        xStart - X-coordinate of the top left corner of the multiple choice object
        yStart - Y-coordinate of the top left corner of the multiple choice object
        answers - List of correct answers
        type - Type of multiple choice. E.g. drop down, radio..
        orientation - Vertical/horizontal orientation of the object
        retry - Enable/disable retry after wrong attempt
        marks - Awarded marks for correct answer

        Returns:
